feed.title: Thoughts on web development & more
feed.subtitle: Blogging about accessible web development and web performance, maybe. Plus occassionally SEO

entry.title: Laura is Here (this site!)
entry.content:
This website!

My little home on the web to show off all my other cool websites. Experiments with a vanilla JS theme-picker and lazy-loaded images.

Built on the JAMStack using 11ty.

entry.title: Long Beach Anarchist Collective
entry.content:
A website built to help Long Beach Anarchist Collective publicize their events, complete with updateable event listing through Forestry CMS and a service worker leveraged from Gatsby’s rich plugin ecosystem to tick that Lighthouse PWA box and enable installation on mobile devices as a web app.

Built on the JAMStack using Gatsby and React. Hosted on Netlify.

entry.title: Stefan BC at Law
entry.content: Stefan Borst-Censullo’s law practice site. Migrated and redesigned from Wordpress.

entry.title: Tiffany Hooton Therapy
entry.content: The website for Tiffany Hooton’s queer and gender affirming therapy practice in Long Beach. Integrated with Forestry CMS for easy content editing.

entry.title: Small World Travel Africa
entry.content: Steve and Catherine Hanna Askin’s website for Small World Travel Africa, a service offering cultural learning and travel experiences in southern Africa.
